name: PO** GAME
description:
Those dastardly devils at Atari still have the copyright, so here we are with a dirty, filthy, sleazy PO** game. 

My current real project takes to much time effort and skill to finish and my motivation has hit a low. By ripping off some old games for a while i might learn a bit and actually finish some games. The game is free and the code is available, go nuts.

Select number of players 0-2 by pressing 0,1 or 2.  Press R to restart the game.
